verbs.description: hazel mae [V: leaving] nesn nesn today announced that sportsdesk anchor hazel mae will leave the sports network at the end of the month after four incredible and exciting years at nesn i ’ve decided now was the right time for me to make this difficult decision to leave hazel mae said in a statement released today it has been both … nesn hazel mae
